Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>蒼獣聖典<White>をそのまま読んだってダメよ。 暗示に使われた言葉を特定しないと！
Entry.EnglishText: We can't just read the entirety of the <Blue>Azure Beast's Scripture<White>. We have to single out the phrase that was used.

Entry.JapaneseText: 街の人がその言葉を耳にしてるかもしれない。 そいつを聞きだすしかねえぜ！
Entry.EnglishText: The people around town have probably heard it. We'll have to go ask them!
